name: Acrylic Nail Art
short_description:
Apart from your facial beauty there are other parameters too that needs beautification. This one is going to be a real tear jerker since acrylicNail Art will tend to increase your credibility. A wish to do something more imaginative among ladies has started decoration of nails that is termed as Nail Art. 

That is our preference. Before starting with anything first thing you need to know is practice makes a man perfect. Exactly, that painted rather a picture at the time. 

That's what I discovered. You need to try for a considerable time and the more you try the better you get.  http://blogs.rediff.com/nailartcreation/2013/01/17/nail-art-creation-innovative-way-to-have-style-statement/
